name: Stella Glow
description:
For an entire millennium, the world has been devoid of "song" as a
result of a savage war. Only 5 Witches left in the land are able to use
"song magic." However, Hilda the Witch of Destruction plans to eliminate
the other Witches and the world with her curse of Crystallization. Alto
and the Regnant Knights must now do all they can to stop Hilda, starting
with recruiting the other Witches and using their power of song to break
the curse.

Befriend the Witches, dive into their Spirit Worlds, and defeat the
enemies causing their inner turmoil to level up their powers! Magic,
weapons, and superior tactics are necessary to get through the barrage
of enemies you'll discover. In addition to combat, make sure to plan out
your tasks during free time. Balance combat and free time in game, as
both are necessary to advance the story! Make your choices wisely and
save the world!
